summary: Filmmakers Robert Baca and Josh Rizzo offer an entertaining look into the world and history of Apple, Inc.
cast: Wayne Bibbens|Vince Briel|Charles DeVore|Richard Halsey|Andy Hertzfeld|Drew Hudgins|Steve Jobs|Leander Kahney|Guy Kawasaki|Steve Kret|John Moltz|Jim Reekes|Simon Tarr|Ron Wayne|Wayne Wenzlaff
title: Welcome to Macintosh
